testcase.name: Test02
testcase.system-out: Given User is on automation page............................................passed Then Verify that home page is visible successfully..........................passed Then User clicks on 'Signup / Login' button.................................passed Then Verify 'Login to your account' is visible..............................passed Then User Enters correct email address and password.........................passed Then user clicks 'login' button.............................................passed Then Verify that 'Logged in as username' is visible.........................passed Then User clicks 'Delete Account' button to delete account..................passed Then Verify that 'ACCOUNT DELETED!' should be visible visible...............passed
